review: One of the best purchases I have ever made was to buy the Chromecast. Bought this product over a year now and I have gotten more value of this 30$ product than I have for anything else I have ever bought. My parents love the ease of it. They are always casting so many different shows. The Netflix stream for me is excellent. This product also came in handy during the World Cup, I was able to stream the man different games straight to my TV. It is definitely worth having a few around the house. Google needs to bring more and more applications along that it will supprot and it will keep on getting better. Excellent Buy! Simple Setup! Cost Effective!
author: M.S.
